text: Is Google App Engine right for me?
I am thinking about using Google App Engine.It is going to be a huge website.
In that case, what is your piece of advice using Google App Engine.

I heard GAE has restrictions like we cannot store images or files more than 1MB limit(they are going to change this from what I read in the GAE roadmap),query is limited to 1000 results, and I am also going to se web2py with GAE.
So I would like to know your comments.
